Dhawal Joharapurkar
Email: dhawal@ucsc.edu
/ / /

Hi, welcome to my corner of the Internet!

I was born in Nagpur, India, and was moved down to Bangalore by my parents when I was two months old. After spending eighteen years of my life there, I moved west to attend school at Manipal Institute of Technology, Manipal. Thereafter, I spent a year at Xerox Research Center, India before moving out far west to University of California, Santa Cruz where I graduated with an MS in Computer Science.

Upon graduation, I interned with CoinTracker and thereafter, I joined Amazon.com in San Luis Obispo, CA in June 2020.
